messages.text:
hey, I don't know if here is anyone use `emacs-jupyter`,
I want to open a jupyter notebook program in browser, and edit the code in emacs,
then I execute some command in emacs, it will send the code to jupyter notebook on brower, which render the result
can you help me out?
ps: my English is very poor, sorry

there is a way to turn it off, or set it much higher
